description:
Discover Playtomic, the app that connects you with an ever-growing community of over 1 million players of padel, tennis, and other racket sports. Enjoy a unique experience with our intuitive and easy-to-use app, which was designed with you in mind.

Find like-minded players in our padel community. Whether you already have friends to play with or are just looking for new partners, Playtomic offers you the chance to connect with people from your club or other padel clubs nearby. What’s more, you can receive personalized recommendations and follow players in your community. The idea is to connect, play and have fun in a social setting! You can also chat with your playing partners and follow their progress too.

Easily organize your perfect match. Create private matches at your favorite padel club or an indoor padel court. Make them public so that other players can join in the fun or you can even join in with an already active match. You have total control over how you play. And if you need help booking a padel court, don’t worry. Playtomic has a wide network of padel clubs and over 16,000 courts worldwide, both indoor and outdoor. You can book a court that suits your needs and wishes. In addition, you will have the option to pay the court fees in full yourself or split them with the other players. A padel court can be yours in the blink of an eye!

If you’re looking for exciting padel leagues and tournaments, Playtomic is the place for you. Show off your talent, improve your game, climb the rankings, and have fun, all while meeting new players and checking out new clubs. It’s the ideal opportunity to grow as a player and dive into the passionate world of padel.

On Playtomic, you can easily and quickly keep track of your progress. Although advanced stats are available with our Premium subscription, even with a free account you can see basic data, such as matches played, won and lost, as well as your recent matches and results. If you want to take your experience to the next level, you can go Premium and unlock all of the exclusive functions.



///////////////////////////// UNLIMITED PREMIUM EXPERIENCE /////////////////////////////

Once you join Premium, you can enjoy a limitless experience. Save money on every transaction and avoid additional court booking fees. Furthermore, you will receive personalized priority alerts. You will be able to select which notifications you want to receive according to your preferences so that you stay up to date on matches, courts, and last-minute opportunities. Your time is money, and it is valuable to us too!

Effectively promote your matches and attract other padel players. Both matches that you create and those that you join will be marked as “Gold Matches”, which will allow other players to easily find them and join in the fun. And to make sure that you always find an available court, we will assign one to you immediately. Pretty cool, no?

Make the most of your performance data and get advanced padel stats. Check out detailed info on your performance, matches, sets, and other interesting metrics. Track your best winning streak, identify your most challenging opponent, and compare your performance with other padel players. 

Challenge yourself, improve your performance, and enjoy the full Playtomic experience. Subscribe now and don’t miss another exciting opportunity in the world of padel!

The official Jude Bellingham app has arrived.  
Step into the world of Jude Bellingham like never before with his brand-new, free official app.  

Whether you're a lifelong fan or just discovering Jude’s journey, this app brings you exclusive behind-the-scenes content, real-time match updates, and in-game stats straight from the pitch.  

Key features: 
•	Exclusive content – Access behind-the-scenes footage of Jude’s life away from the spotlight.  
•	Matches - Receive real-time match updates, Jude’s upcoming fixtures and in-game stats. 
•	Partnerships – Discover Jude’s latest brand collabs and shop his official merchandise all in one place. 
•	Videos – View interviews, training clips and personal moments you won’t find anywhere else. 
•	Jude’s Journey – Relive the highlights, key milestones and unforgettable moments of Jude’s career so far. 
•	Multi-language – Enjoy a seamless experience in your preferred language – choose from English, French, German, Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese. 

Wherever you are in the world, the Jude Bellingham app puts you at the heart of his story.  

Download now and stay connected to every moment.

Welcome to bet365’s most advanced sports betting app yet! Available on iPhone and iPad. Download the betting app today and find out why it’s Never Ordinary at bet365.

Official Sponsor of the UEFA Champions League

Bet on a wide range of In-Play and pre-match sports including Premier League, Champions League, Horse Racing, NFL and Formula 1.

bet365 customers can enjoy an unrivalled user experience including:
· Super Boosts: Get our BIGGEST prices on selected markets with Super Boost. 

· Winnings Boosts: BOOST your winnings on featured sports and events for Bet Builders and selected single bets - increasing your winnings without increasing your stake.

· Bet Builder+: Combine the most popular markets from selected events into one bet. Our user-friendly interface has everything in one place so you can build the bet you want. Available pre-match and In-Play on a wide range of fantastic sports.

· Free Games: Enter free-to-play games such as 6 Scores Challenge, 6 Horses Challenge, Goals Giveaway & more. Play for your chance to win prizes for free! 

· Fantasy Sports: Gives you numerous ways to play, including Full Season and Weekly Tournaments with varying entry prices and prizes. 

· In-Play Betting: Bet on tens of thousands of In-Play markets across a wide range of sports such as: American Football, Soccer and Basketball.

· Live Streaming: bet365 streams hundreds of thousands of events worldwide every year, bringing top quality live sporting action straight to your device wherever you are. Featuring events globally from major Soccer leagues, the NBA, NFL & more.

· Match Live: Follow In-Play events live and monitor your bets and stats as the action unfolds. Available on a wide range of fantastic sports.

· Live Golf Tracker: Follow every drive, iron and putt from your favourite players in some of the biggest Golf competitions in the world from the PGA TOUR and DP World Tour.

· Sports Stats: Study the stats for major leagues across the globe including American Football, Soccer and Basketball.

· Personalised Display: Easily navigate to your preferred sports as our intuitive App will show you the type of sports you bet on. You can also favourite specific sports via the A-Z Sports menu for easy access.

· My Teams: Our dedicated My Teams page allows you to quickly place your Soccer bets and view upcoming fixtures for your favourite teams.

· Sports Betting & News: Keep up to date with the very latest news across a wide range of sports and get extra betting insights from our talent and tipsters.

· bet365 Extra: View our extensive range of offers and promotions.

· Search: Use our search facility to quickly find the sport, league, event or market you want to bet on.

· Face ID: Access your account securely within seconds. Only available on supported devices.

· Choose from a wide range of payment methods including Debit Card, PayPal and Apple Pay.

· Use your existing bet365 account or sign up via the app


You must be 18 or over to have a bet365 account

Spond is the best solution for organising sports teams, social groups and group activities. Join hundreds of thousands of members, coaches and parents using Spond every month to organise their groups. Spond is built to support both adult members and parents communicating on behalf of their children.

• Keep track of attendance for matches, trainings and other events
• Spond automatically send reminders to late responders
• Seamless integration with your calendar
• Attendance statistics
• Share information, pictures or updates with posts
• Create polls and let the members vote
• Request payments from members
• Send direct messages and create group chats
• Organise large teams into subgroups
• Support for parents communicating on behalf of their children.
• Import members from Excel, share group links or add members by email/SMS
• Batch create event or import matches from Excel
• Create repeating events for training
• Export participant lists to Excel
• The app is not required - members can receive information by email
• Free to download and use

Stakemate - More Than Just a Sports Betting App
Bet on football your way!
Group Bet, Chat, Build Bets, Share & Copy Accas, & more! 


The Stakemate App makes your betting experience more social and fun, whether you're betting on the weekend's Premier League Football, NFL American Football, or the latest tennis matches, with Stakemate you can:
- Group Bet & Win as a Team
- Build Bets in your Accumulators (ACCAS)
- Share your winning bets, and Copy Friends’ Bets

You also get:
- Group Chat to Discuss Games
- Early Payout to Settle your bets early whenever your team is up 2 goals
- Watch Real-Time Match Updates
- Match Stats and Lineups
- Easy Deposit & Cash Out Features

Stakemate is the go-to app to bet on sports with mates. It's the social way to bet - because win or lose, it’s more fun with friends.


PLAYER MARKETS
Bet on player shots, fouls, goals, assists, and cards, all in Stakemate now! Available pre-match on select matches.

GROUP BETS
Team up with friends in one seamless app to bet together, chat about selections, follow live odds, and celebrate real-time match wins—no more juggling platforms. It's betting made easy, social, and fun—just like your squad chat but with the added rush of shared stakes and wins.

EARLY PAYOUT
Whenever your team is up by 2-goals, your selection wins! Only available on select matches.

GROUPS
Chat just like you would on other messaging apps & say goodbye to screenshots. Share accas and bet builders with your mates and have them copy your winning bets. Bet on the weekend's football together!

ACCA WITH BET BUILDER
Easily combine selections from different matches into the same bet.

COPY YOUR MATES’ BET
Create a group for you and your mates to share and copy bets.

IN-PLAY BETTING
Stake bets on various markets within Football. Including Full Time Match Result, Over/Under, Both Teams to Score, Anytime Goalscorer and more.

CASH OUTS:
Easily cash out your bets whether they are pre-match or in-play. You're in control, so you can cash out when you want. (Where cash out is available)

STATS REAL TIME UPDATES
Check out lineups, head-to-head results and live tables. See updates on the games while seeing your potential payouts on your bets.

MULTIPLE SPORTS AND LEAGUES:
Stakemate offers betting on a variety of Football Leagues across Europe to the rest of the world. You can bet on the games in the English Premier League, English Championship, World Cup, French Ligue 1, and much more. You can also bet on tennis, american football and NFL. More sports are coming soon! Bet on football or any sports you want.

SIMPLE & INTUITIVE DESIGN
Our app is all about simplicity and social connection which means less time figuring out how to bet and more time enjoying the game with friends. Dive into a betting experience that’s easy, fun, and social - because that’s how betting should be.

GET STARTED NOW & TRANSFORM THE WAY YOU BET!

- Download the Stakemate App
- Use Instant Sign-Up+ to verify your identity within seconds and deposit £10 or
- Use Manual Sign Up (no deposit needed)
- Find your league & game
- Choose your unique combinations of selections
- Submit your individual or sports bet with friends
- Share with your mates & enjoy the game

Welcome to Stakemate, the UK’s fastest growing social betting app!

The Paddy Power Sports Betting app has you covered with ACCAs, Bet Builders, Power Prices, Mix 'N' Match & more. 

Bet on all your favourite sports, whenever and wherever you like. Bet with Paddy Power Sports Betting. We cover every major sport and event from the Premier League and Champions League, including the biggest international tournaments like the Euros & World Cup in football. 
We don’t stop at football, bet on the biggest horse racing meets including Cheltenham, the Grand National, Epsom Derby & Glorious Goodwood. Don’t forget about the biggest boxing bouts, rugby, tennis, golf, darts & F1 too - and our odds-makers always try to give you the best odds - they like a challenge! 

Football feature - Paddy Power’s Super Sub feature lets you roll over your bet to the new player coming on. Our bet builder allows you to pick from multiple markets for a single event across a range of sports and combine them into one bet! Paddy Power offers more bet builder markets than any other bookmaker. And, as if that weren’t enough good news, Paddy’s offering Bet Builder Insurance too – meaning if one leg of your 4+ leg Bet Builder ACCA lets you down, you get money back as a free bet up to £/€10!

Bet with Paddy! Download the Paddy Power Sports Betting App today to join our online sports betting community.

• Super Sub
We’ve all been there. Watching the match, the centre forwards are in blistering goalscoring form and you’ve chucked them in a bet – then they dislocate an eyelash in the first few minutes and hobble off. That’s the end of that. Not anymore. If your player selection is hauled off, your bet will switch over to whoever replaces them, and thus the Super Sub was born!

• Multi Match Bet Builder
Combine your Bet Builder across multiple matches!

Not sure who to back in your bet builder? Follow the crowd with Paddy’s new Most Popular Bet Builders feature. This feature lets you see what bet builders other people are backing in real-time.

We've added fouls and shots on target markets to improve your bet builder options.

New and improved features to track your bet builder in play.

Acca stats is the next-level analysis of how you’ve been doing in your multiples. Browse the bets that have been your biggest achievements. See which markets you’ve had the most success with and which ones are not your strong suit so that you know which bets to go for the next time you build a bet builder!

• Player Stats 
Our new Player Stats feature gives you access to relevant player data such as goals, shots and cards for every game, to give you more information for your bet

Target DartCounter is the world’s biggest darts scorer app for keeping track of all your scores. Play x01 games, Cricket, Around the Clock and several other training games.
Play online against your friends or challenge the computer dartbot.
In the x01 games you will hear the voice of MasterCaller Ray Martin who will announce your name and all your scores.

Register or log in and all your games will be saved.
Play with multiple players with a DartCounter account and the whole game will be saved in both accounts.

IN-APP PURCHASES 
The app offers one in-app purchases; "Ultimate Yearly" and "Ultimate Monthly". These are annual  and monthly auto renewable subscription which gives you access to more features and statistics to improve your darts skills.

When you own this subscription you will get the newest gameplays earlier than the users without the subscription. Also, we will keep adding more Ultimate features in the future updates to make the usage easier, more detailed and even more fun!

GENERAL PAYMENT INFORMATION
• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase


PRICING
The Ultimate Yearly subscription costs $34.99 USD each year, the Ultimate Monthly subscription costs $4.99 USD each year. This will be automatically converted to your own currency by iTunes. For more information about the annual payment or how to cancel auto renewing, read "Payment & Cancellation".


PAYMENT & CANCELLATION
The payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.

24 hours before the end of each subscription period (one year) you'll automatically be charged the same amount as you've paid for the initial purchase.
After renewing, your subscription will be valid for another year.

You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes/App Store account settings; 
you must do so at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period to avoid being billed for the next cycle.

The official BBC Sport app offers you the latest sports news, scores, live sport and highlights. It’s the best way to follow all the latest sporting action!

Download the BBC Sport app, you’ll get live analysis and scores so that you can keep up to date throughout the sporting year.

The BBC Sport app has dedicated sections covering Premier League Football, Six Nations Rugby Union, Rugby League, Cricket, Formula 1, Tennis, Golf, Boxing and Athletics so you’ll be up to date with the world’s biggest events.

SPORTS NEWS
The BBC Sport app brings you all the breaking news across the world of sport including football, cricket, rugby union, rugby league, F1, tennis, golf, athletics and much more. Read all of the latest headlines, football gossip, transfer rumours and league action as the stories unfold. You can even share news stories and sports results with your friends and followers across your social channels.

SPORT RESULTS
Never again do you have to miss any of the latest action. The BBC Sport app offers in-depth results, analysis, live scores, match stats and text commentaries — keeping you up-to-date with all the action when you’re on the go.

MY SPORT
Create a personalised “My Sport” page to bring together the stories, results and fixtures for the sports you love. Choose from over 350 different topics to follow including your favourite team or sports.

TOP FLIGHT FOOTBALL
As well as our football and Premier League pages, each team in England's top flight also has their own page — a one-stop shop for all the best digital content about that club, including insight and analysis from journalists and pundits across the BBC, plus the best of social media.
 
And, of course, you also get your fixtures, results, tables and player stats.
 
Want the biggest news and match updates from your team sent direct to your phone or tablet? Then download the BBC Sport app and sign up to notifications.
 
With news notifications for all 20 Premier League sides, you will have the biggest stories and the best content about your club at your fingertips.
 
ALERTS
Receive personalised notifications that get delivered directly to your locked screen. Set notifications for top sports stories, plus more than 400 football teams, dozens of cricket and rugby teams and every Formula 1 race!

LIVE SPORT
Watch major sporting events live or catch up with on-demand highlights straight to your mobile or tablet device.

AROUND THE BBC
Discover the best sporting content from around the BBC via the BBC Sport app including podcasts through BBC Sounds, exclusive content on BBC iPlayer and more.
